DOC.brief_title: The Perioperative Analgesic Efficiency Bilateral Superficial Cervical Plexus Block Patients With Thyroidectomy
DOC.detailed_description: Bilateral superficial cervical plexus block successfully demonstrate provide efficient analgesia patient thyroidectomy , parathyroidectomy , carotis end-arterectomy . The present study aim investigate intraoperative hemodynamic response , anesthetic analgesic consumption , postoperative recovery quality bilateral superficial cervical plexus block patient total thyroidectomy . After approval , patient enrol study invite complete Pain Catastrophizing Scale questionnaire . Patients divide two group computer-based randomization technique control study group . After standard monitorization , anesthesia induction tracheal intubation , bilateral superficial cervical plexus block perform study group intervention control group . At end operation patient receive paracetamol 1 gr intravenous . In postoperative period , visual analog scale value , opioid consumption , presence nausea-vomiting , anti-emetic usage complication record .
